name: Rent a Car & Go
description: Live the adventure at your own pace with a fully equipped 4x4. Travel freely, camp under the stars, or stay in yurts and hotels.
features: Option to upgrade accommodations (yurts, guesthouses, hotels)
Freedom to choose your route and pace
Perfect for families and small groups

metadata.title: Rent a Car & Go | Explore Kyrgyzstan
metadata.description: Enjoy Kyrgyzstan at your own pace with a 4x4 and camping gear.

name: Let an Expert Guide You
description: Relax while a local driver-guide takes you through hidden trails, cooks for you, and shares cultural insights.
features: Local knowledge: secret spots, cultural insights, traditions
Wild cooking experience by your guide

metadata.title: Guided Adventure | Explore Kyrgyzstan
metadata.description: Discover Kyrgyzstan worry-free with an expert local guide.

name: Join a Group Adventure
description: Share the journey with fellow explorers in a fun and social group setup across Kyrgyzstan.

metadata.title: Group Adventure | Explore Kyrgyzstan
metadata.description: Join a group of 15–20 explorers and share unforgettable moments.
